content: Hi everyone! Is there are any way right now in Lean 4 to turn off universe checking? Or at least get impredicative base universe? I'd like to get Church-encoded data for benchmarking purposes.
Hi András, I'm afraid there isn't. You can kind of circumvent it by unsafeCasting e.g. to NonScalar, but that's not very pretty.
Thanks. It turns out I can define everything I need predicatively.
